outputs.output_descr:
This project presents the following objectives:

a)	To enhance the capabilities of the Secretary of State on Human Rights to act as the main official body to human rights supervision;
b)	To increase the awareness of the Brazilian society and strengthen its action towards the protection and promotion of individual and collective rights;
c)	To widen access to and improve the quality of the several bodies in charge of the protection of civilian rights, especially with reference to discriminated groups, including those of  the physically impaired, infant, adolescent or aged people, by supporting the creation and integration of networks in order to exchange experience and expertise.

Major outputs of the project are: 
•	Consolidation of the National Human Rights Network
•	Decentralization of the implementation of the National Human Rights Plan with establishment in partnership with states and municipalities of units in all Brazilian States
•	Design and implementation of a monitoring system for PNDH and the activities of the Secretariat for Human Rights
•	Strengthening of relevant NGOS and councils to develop products and services linked to the promotion and defense of human rights
•	Best practices in Human Rights analyzed, disseminated and multiplied.

project_descr: Human Rights: A Commitment  with  Democracy Consolidation
